channel.title: Your First Post
channel.description:
Alright I'm bored and at school so I thought why not start a new game/thread?
All you do is goto your profile and look up your very first post then post it here. I feel like a noob but here's mine:
[quote="therealjdb, post:8, topic:2227"]the reason im gana be here now is because Fagex shut down, i hope i grow to like this site just as well as Fagex...[/quote]
Lol, Then I realized this place was a lot better and now look at me ;D

item.title: Your First Post
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:1, topic:3526”]Hi everybody. Im pretty sure at least a hundred of you know me, because i was here since the creation of the forums. ~3 months after that i got banned for spamming. I understand my mistake, and i know how hard it is for mods and admins to keep track of spam and non-spam. So yeah, i know that i broke a very big rule by spamming. I’m sorry moparisthebest and the mods at the time. And I’m sorry everyone else. I know this is a really big and popular community, and by spamming i made it worse. I understand my mistake and im hoping that i can get another chance. Also, before i started writing this letter of apology, i was browsing through the forums. This reminded me of the end of the movie, “The Aviator.” I was browsing through the forums and i saw spam, and people werent getting blamed for it, i meaqn the first ten messages i saw were like.

[quote][quote]
some quote
[/quote]
^^ Spam << Spam

and

some weird java code flaming some guy

It doesnt work[/quote]
So the part reminding me of the movie is.
Senator Brewster (in our case moparisthebest and other people) was blaming Howard Hughes (this case me) of taking money to build planes that never flew (“planes that never flew” is spam in our case). Howard Hughes said that companies like Boeing, lockheed took money on planes that never flew. Boeing and lockheed being other members.

So my point. I’m not the onl one spamming, but im the only one getting warnings for it.

But anyways,m i understand my mistake, and i really want to be part of this growing and thriving community. I hope people would understand me, and i mean after all, people deserve second chances. So i was hoping i could get that second chance. And i swear that ill try not to spam. I understand the hard work that’s needed to keep this community alive and ill do my best make it easier.

Also, the IRC thing, everybody was ignoring me and i needed someone to talk to. Sorry daiki and everyone else. :)[/quote]

that was my “ban appeal” to get unbanned from uiltra amss spammage lol[br][size=1]Posted at: September 18, 2006, 07:32:42 PM[/size][hr]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4226.msg42290.html#msg42290

Read full topic

item.title: Your First Post
item.dc:creator: @z7skillz7z7z z7skillz7z7z
item.description:
@z7skillz7z7z wrote:

[quote=“z7skillz7z7z”]THIS IS WHERE YOU CAN POST YOU OWN PRIVATE SERVERS SO EVERYONE CAN GO TO SEE THEM! so ur not like omfg y isnt any1 in my server… gah!

To submit you server copy and paste and fill this out!

Server IP:
Month it was made:
1/10 What do YOU give it:
When its mostly online(EST pl0x):

Then after that all you gota do is sit back and wait for people to come to your server!

Well thats it so go ahead and post your server…

Server Honorable mentions:
~1st~
~2nd~
~3rd~
~4th~
~5th~

Currently: waiting for peeps to post[/quote]

then flamed/locked :/[br][size=1]Posted at: September 18, 2006, 04:37:32 PM[/size][hr][quote=“moparisthebest, post:17, topic:15163”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=3.msg8#msg8 date=1140643360]
Here are the rules and guidelines for both Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org.

1. We are not anti-leech. If you respect our community and our ideas, feel free to ask questions and they will be kindly answered if you follow other rules. Answer to questions that others ask if you know the answer or remain silent!
2. We don’t talk about things we don’t know. This is informative, not misinformative community.
3. We don’t make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use “you” not “u”, we use “why” not “y” etc.
4. We don’t make posts that contain unuseful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.
5. We don’t “bump” or double post.
6. We respect each other and other communities. We don’t flame each other or other communities. We don’t fight on the forums.
7. We don’t advertise other sites or communities unless we ask and receive permission to and from moparisthebest. We don’t post links to sites that are not in safe sites list on moparisthebest.com main page.
8. We don’t care about post count alone. If someone has high post count and most of it is spam, we hate him. If someone has high post count with informative posts, we love him. The higher count, the more we hate/love him.
9. We don’t talk about “rep” ever, whether you are asking for it or saying that you have given it.
10. DO NOT post or upload any copyrighted materials, ie deobs, clients or any other sort (however if you were to link to a file that was uploaded somewhere else or post code in the pasteBin, well, I would have no control over that right? )
11. We don’t sell anything on these forums with the exception of SCAR scripts.
12. We never have misleading links in your signatures. If your signature says www.google.com, we expect it to take us to google.com.
13. Nothing to do with private servers belongs on moparisthebest.com, use moparisthebest.com for these things.

If any of these rules have been broken, then you will be punished. So please, just follow our rules.

We’re not asking too much. Thank you.
[/quote]

Too bad more people dont read it :([/quote]

i LOL’d

Read full topic

item.title: Your First Post
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

[quote=“BobDole81, post:2, topic:1695”]To follow up, string comparisons like the one in the example are not technically the correct way to compare the value of two strings. Being that they are both strings in the above example are string literals and both reside in the same memory address, however, the example works as expected.

But it’s still preferred to use the equals method instead. So:

if(name.equals(otherName)) System.out.println("They are equal."); [/quote]

I was picking on someone’s java conditionals tutorial

Read full topic
